sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO comtnwikmnthngreprt ( reprt_id , reprt_se , reprt_sj , report_de , wrter_id , reportr_id , report_bgnde , report_endde , thswik_report_cn , nextwik_report_cn , partclr_matter , atch_file_id , confm_dt , frst_register_id , frst_regist_pnttm ) VALUES ( #reprtId# , #reprtSe# , #reprtSj# , #reportDe# , #wrterId# , #reportrId# , #reportBgnde# , #reportEndde# , #thswikReportCn# , #nextwikReportCn# , #partclrMatter# , #atchFileId# , #confmDt# , #frstRegisterId# , SYSDATE )
sqlMap.update: UPDATE comtnwikmnthngreprt SET reprt_id = #reprtId# , reprt_se = #reprtSe# , reprt_sj = #reprtSj# , report_de = #reportDe# , wrter_id = #wrterId# , reportr_id = #reportrId# , report_bgnde = #reportBgnde# , report_endde = #reportEndde# , thswik_report_cn = #thswikReportCn# , nextwik_report_cn = #nextwikReportCn# , partclr_matter = #partclrMatter# , atch_file_id = #atchFileId# , confm_dt = #confmDt# , last_updusr_id = #lastUpdusrId# , last_updt_pnttm = SYSDATE WHERE 1 = 1 AND reprt_id = #reprtId#
sqlMap.delete: DELETE FROM comtnwikmnthngreprt WHERE 1 = 1 AND reprt_id = #reprtId#
sqlMap.select: SELECT reprt_id , reprt_se , reprt_sj , report_de , wrter_id , reportr_id , report_bgnde , report_endde , thswik_report_cn , nextwik_report_cn , partclr_matter , atch_file_id , confm_dt , frst_register_id , frst_regist_pnttm , last_updusr_id , last_updt_pnttm FROM COMTNWIKMNTHNGREPRT WHERE reprt_id = #reprtId#

SELECT A.REPRT_ID , A.REPRT_SE , A.REPRT_SJ , A.REPORT_DE , A.WRTER_ID , A.REPORTR_ID , A.REPORT_BGNDE , A.REPORT_ENDDE , A.THSWIK_REPORT_CN , A.NEXTWIK_REPORT_CN , A.PARTCLR_MATTER , A.ATCH_FILE_ID , A.CONFM_DT , A.FRST_REGISTER_ID , A.FRST_REGIST_PNTTM , A.LAST_UPDUSR_ID , A.LAST_UPDT_PNTTM FROM ( SELECT REPRT_ID , REPRT_SE , REPRT_SJ , REPORT_DE , WRTER_ID , REPORTR_ID , REPORT_BGNDE , REPORT_ENDDE , THSWIK_REPORT_CN , NEXTWIK_REPORT_CN , PARTCLR_MATTER , ATCH_FILE_ID , CONFM_DT , FRST_REGISTER_ID , FRST_REGIST_PNTTM , LAST_UPDUSR_ID , LAST_UPDT_PNTTM , ROWNUM FROM COMTNWIKMNTHNGREPRT WHERE 1=1
REPRT_ID = #searchKeyword#
REPRT_SE LIKE '%' || #searchKeyword# || '%'
ORDER BY REPRT_ID DESC ) A WHERE ROWNUM BETWEEN #firstIndex# AND #recordCountPerPage#

SELECT COUNT(*) totcnt FROM COMTNWIKMNTHNGREPRT WHERE 1=1
REPRT_ID = #searchKeyword#
REPRT_SE LIKE '%' || #searchKeyword# || '%'
